Class FrequencyMap

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.TreeMap<K,V>
          be.abeel.util.DefaultTreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
              be.abeel.util.FrequencyMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>, java.util.NavigableMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>, java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
public class FrequencyMap
extends DefaultTreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>

An extension of a TreeMap that is designed to be used as a frequency table.

Author:
Thomas Abeel
See Also:
Serialized Form

public FrequencyMap removeAbove(int max)
